CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- Unit 정보를 가진 유닛생산 버튼 관련 함수들 -- 버튼생성, 정보갱신, Close 버튼 동작 -- /ui/ProductionUI/ProductionInfo

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local UnitDataSet = _DataService:GetTable("Unit") local RowCount = UnitDataSet:GetRowCount()
local UnitList = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/ProductionUI/ProductionInfo/UnitList") local UnitInfoExample = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/ProductionUI/ProductionInfo/UnitList/UnitInfoExample") for i=1, RowCount do local RowData = {} for j=1, 6 do table.insert(RowData, j, UnitDataSet:GetCell(i,j)) end
local CopiedEntity = _SpawnService:Clone(RowData[1], UnitInfoExample, UnitList) local CopiedEntityUnitImage = CopiedEntity:GetChildByName("UnitImage") local CopiedEntityDescription = CopiedEntity:GetChildByName("Description") local CopiedEntityName = CopiedEntity:GetChildByName("Name") local CopiedEntityCost = CopiedEntity:GetChildByName("Cost")
CopiedEntityUnitImage.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.ImageRUID = RowData[2] CopiedEntityDescription.TextComponent.Text = RowData[4] CopiedEntityName.TextComponent.Text = RowData[5] CopiedEntityCost.TextComponent.Text = RowData[6]
CopiedEntity.UnitInfoButton.Name = RowData[1] CopiedEntity.UnitInfoButton.ModelID = RowData[3] CopiedEntity.UnitInfoButton.KoreanName = RowData[5] CopiedEntity.UnitInfoButton.Cost = RowData[6]
end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: RenewNumOfProduction
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local UnitList = self.Entity:GetChildByName("UnitList") local NumOfProduction = self.CalledBy.Barrack.NumOfProduction
for i, value in pairs(NumOfProduction) do UnitList:GetChildByName(i):GetChildByName("NumOfProduction").ProducingTextComponent:SetText(value) end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SetUI
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local BuildingEntity = self.Entity
if Enable == true then self.CalledBy.Building:IncreaseUsingCount() else self.CalledBy.Building:DecreaseUsingCount() end
BuildingEntity:SetVisible(Enable) BuildingEntity:SetEnable(Enable)

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- if isvalid(self.CalledBy) then self:SetUI(false) else local ProductionInfo = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/ProductionUI/ProductionInfo")
ProductionInfo:SetVisible(false) ProductionInfo:SetEnable(false) end
self.CalledBy = nil
